aboutMe.title: Juan Villaverde
aboutMe.description: <mark>Software developer</mark> graduated from the University of A Coruña (UDC) and currently pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Engineering at the same university. Experience as a <mark>private tutor</mark> and in <mark>personal projects</mark>.
experience.title: Experience
experience_1.title: Private Tutor
experience_1.description: I provided <mark>programming lessons</mark> in C independently and online through the <mark>Tus Clases Particulares</mark> platform. The lessons were aimed at helping students understand the fundamentals and pass their programming courses.
experience_2.title: Personal Projects
experience_2.description: I have carried out several <mark>self-initiated projects</mark> that have allowed me to expand my knowledge and improve my programming skills.
projects.title: Projects
projects_1.title: Musical Synthesizer
projects_1.description: My final degree project: I developed an <mark>audio plugin</mark> in C++ for sound and music creation. It includes features like waveform generation, modulation, and sound effects. The final grade was a <mark>9.0</mark>.
projects_2.title: Bus Pontevedra
projects_2.description: A mobile app in development that displays the <mark>bus schedules</mark> for the city of Pontevedra. Since much of the data is incorrect, a website was also created to help correct it.
projects_3.title: VuelingConnect
projects_3.description: VuelingConnect is an app that allows travelers to share critical flight information during network outages using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) technology. The app creates a mesh network between devices, allowing information to propagate without requiring internet access.
